creator: flawlor@athensgroup.com
text:
With the 4.0.2 Tomcat, I now need to add a Context element to to server.xml 
with crossContext="true".  The default used to be true.  I see no documentation 
that it has changed.

This causes a package install problem (I'll submit separate bug on that).

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Yes, this has been changed for security reasons. Please post usage questions on
tomcat-user. Please don't submit any report related to that (I'll resolve with
WONTFIX).
